description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Rubicon adapter
title: Rubicon Adapter Params

___video.description: An object defining additional Rubicon video parameters

___language.description: Language of the ad - should match content video

___skipdelay.description: number of seconds until the ad can be skipped

___skip.description: Can this ad be skipped ( 0 = no, 1 = yes)

___playerHeight.description: Height in pixels of the video player

___playerWidth.description: Width in pixels of the video player

___size_id.description: Rubicon size_id, used to describe type of video ad (preroll, postroll, etc)

___siteId.description: An ID which identifies the site selling the impression

___zoneId.description: An ID which identifies the sub-section of the site where the impression is located

___inventory.description: An object defining arbitrary targeting key/value pairs related to the page

___visitor.description: An object defining arbitrary targeting key/value pairs related to the visitor

___accountId.description: An ID which identifies the publisher's account
